title: Truth in Backup Los Angeles
desc: This was the best seminar I've ever been to! -  Curtis truly is ?Mr. Backup.? He knows his subject matter better than anyone I have met. His presentation skills certainly made for a fun and knowledgeable s eminar. -  This seminar is well worth the time to go to. It gives you the facts you need to help make wise decisions moving forward when it comes to backups, archiving, and determining business requirements and policies around these practices. It does all of this without pushing a vendor or product agenda. -
